<div style="text-align: justify">

## Sign up

If you haven't previously registered and created an account, you need to click on the ```Register``` navigation option on the main openEO algorithm plaza portal landing page and this will launch the registration flow.

![](../_images/PlazaSignin.png)

## Edugain & social login

It is advised to use the ```Edugain & social logins``` option when you do your first sign-in on openEO algorithm plaza.
More information is available at [signing in](SignIn.qmd) information page.
</div>
